comments.body: Does this mean that `ansible-test` in Ansible will not use the `.coveragerc` file in the root directory.

The `.coveragerc` in the root directory will not be used when testing collections, but will continue to be used when testing Ansible itself. I expect to change this in a future PR so that all coverage configuration is generated. At that point we'll be able to remove the static config file.
